| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | [petrification](/wiki/Petrification "Petrification")      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                           |
| A wood troll:* can [swim](/wiki/Swim "Swim").
* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* [regenerates HP quickly](/wiki/Regeneration "Regeneration").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can [follow](/wiki/Follower "Follower") you to other levels.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* normally appears in small [groups](/wiki/Group "Group").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                           |

**Wood trolls** can be encountered in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"). Their [corpses](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") are [vegan](/wiki/Vegan "Vegan"), so they can be eaten by players trying to keep a vegan [conduct](/wiki/Conduct "Conduct") (taking care not to [overeat](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition"), of course) or by [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivorous "Herbivorous") pets.
html:
Wood troll

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
T wood troll
Difficulty 19
Attacks Weapon 2d8 physical, Claw 2d8 physical, Claw 2d6 physical
T wood troll
Difficulty 19
Attacks

Weapon 2d8 physical, Claw 2d8 physical, Claw 2d6 physical

Base level 15
Base experience 401
Speed 10
Base AC −8
Base MR 40
Alignment −3 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 3 (Rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1200
Nutritional value 350
Size large
Resistances petrification

A wood troll:

  • can swim.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • has infravision.
  • normally appears in small groups.
  • cannot be tamed.

Wood trolls can be encountered in dNetHack. Their corpses are vegan, so they can be eaten by players trying to keep a vegan conduct (taking care not to overeat, of course) or by herbivorous pets.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Wood_troll&oldid=128023"

'''Wood trolls''' can be encountered in [[dNetHack]]. Their [[corpse]]s are [[vegan]], so they can be eaten by players trying to keep a vegan [[conduct]] (taking care not to [[Nutrition|overeat]], of course) or by [[herbivorous]] pets.

[[Category:dNetHack monsters]]
